recommendedFoods.en: Iron-rich foods: lean red meat, poultry, spinach, lentils, beans
recommendedFoods.zh: 富含铁的食物：瘦红肉、禽肉、菠菜、扁豆、豆类

recommendedFoods.en: Vitamin C-rich foods to enhance iron absorption: citrus fruits, bell peppers, broccoli
recommendedFoods.zh: 富含维生素C的食物以促进铁吸收：柑橘类水果、甜椒、西兰花

recommendedFoods.en: Omega-3 fatty acids for anti-inflammatory effects: salmon, walnuts, flaxseeds
recommendedFoods.zh: 富含Omega-3脂肪酸以抗炎：三文鱼、核桃、亚麻籽

recommendedFoods.en: Magnesium-rich foods to ease cramps: dark leafy greens, nuts, seeds
recommendedFoods.zh: 富含镁的食物以缓解痉挛：深色绿叶蔬菜、坚果、种子

recommendedFoods.en: Warm, easy-to-digest foods: ginger tea, soups, congee
recommendedFoods.zh: 温热、易消化的食物：姜茶、汤、粥

foodsToAvoid.en: Cold and raw foods, which may worsen cramps
foodsToAvoid.zh: 生冷食物，可能加重痉挛

foodsToAvoid.en: Spicy and greasy foods that can cause digestive upset
foodsToAvoid.zh: 辛辣油腻食物，可能引起消化不适

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive salt, sugar, caffeine, and alcohol
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量的盐、糖、咖啡因和酒精

lifestyleTips.en: Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of warm water.
lifestyleTips.zh: 喝足量的温水以保持水分。

lifestyleTips.en: Keep your body, especially the abdominal area, warm.
lifestyleTips.zh: 保持身体温暖，特别是腹部。

lifestyleTips.en: Engage in light activities like walking or gentle stretching.
lifestyleTips.zh: 进行散步或轻柔伸展等轻度活动。

recommendedFoods.en: Lean proteins to support egg development: chicken, fish, tofu, beans
recommendedFoods.zh: 支持卵泡发育的瘦蛋白：鸡肉、鱼肉、豆腐、豆类

recommendedFoods.en: Cruciferous vegetables to help metabolize estrogen: broccoli, cauliflower, kale
recommendedFoods.zh: 帮助雌激素代谢的十字花科蔬菜：西兰花、菜花、羽衣甘蓝

recommendedFoods.en: Healthy fats for hormone production: avocado, nuts, seeds (flax, pumpkin)
recommendedFoods.zh: 支持激素生成的健康脂肪：牛油果、坚果、种子（亚麻籽、南瓜籽）

recommendedFoods.en: Complex carbohydrates for sustained energy: oats, quinoa, brown rice
recommendedFoods.zh: 提供持续能量的复合碳水化合物：燕麦、藜麦、糙米

recommendedFoods.en: Fermented foods for gut health: yogurt, kimchi, kombucha
recommendedFoods.zh: 有益肠道健康的发酵食品：酸奶、泡菜、康普茶

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive alcohol, which can disrupt hormonal balance
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量饮酒，可能扰乱荷尔蒙平衡

foodsToAvoid.en: Highly processed foods and refined sugars
foodsToAvoid.zh: 高度加工食品和精制糖

lifestyleTips.en: This is a great time for more energetic workouts.
lifestyleTips.zh: 这是进行更有活力锻炼的好时机。

lifestyleTips.en: Focus on nutrient-dense foods to build up your body's resources.
lifestyleTips.zh: 专注于营养密集的食物，以补充身体资源。

recommendedFoods.en: High-fiber foods to support estrogen detoxification: vegetables, whole grains, nuts
recommendedFoods.zh: 支持雌激素排毒的高纤维食物：蔬菜、全谷物、坚果

recommendedFoods.en: Antioxidant-rich foods to protect the egg: berries, leafy greens, colorful vegetables
recommendedFoods.zh: 保护卵子的富含抗氧化剂的食物：浆果、绿叶蔬菜、色彩鲜艳的蔬菜

recommendedFoods.en: Zinc for reproductive health: oysters, pumpkin seeds, lentils
recommendedFoods.zh: 有益生殖健康的锌：牡蛎、南瓜籽、扁豆

recommendedFoods.en: B-vitamins for energy and hormone regulation: whole grains, lean meat, eggs
recommendedFoods.zh: 支持能量和激素调节的B族维生素：全谷物、瘦肉、鸡蛋

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive caffeine and alcohol
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量的咖啡因和酒精

foodsToAvoid.en: Inflammatory foods like fried foods and refined carbohydrates
foodsToAvoid.zh: 油炸食品和精制碳水化合物等炎性食物

lifestyleTips.en: Ensure adequate hydration to support cervical fluid.
lifestyleTips.zh: 确保充足水分以支持宫颈粘液。

lifestyleTips.en: Listen to your body; energy levels are at their peak.
lifestyleTips.zh: 倾听身体的声音；此时能量水平处于顶峰。

recommendedFoods.en: Magnesium-rich foods to reduce cramps and improve mood: pumpkin seeds, spinach, dark chocolate
recommendedFoods.zh: 富含镁以减少痉挛和改善情绪的食物：南瓜籽、菠菜、黑巧克力

recommendedFoods.en: Vitamin B6 to support progesterone production: chickpeas, salmon, bananas
recommendedFoods.zh: 支持孕酮生成的维生素B6：鹰嘴豆、三文鱼、香蕉

recommendedFoods.en: Complex carbs to stabilize blood sugar and mood: sweet potatoes, oats, quinoa
recommendedFoods.zh: 稳定血糖和情绪的复合碳水化合物：红薯、燕麦、藜麦

recommendedFoods.en: Calcium-rich foods to ease PMS: yogurt, tofu, almonds
recommendedFoods.zh: 缓解经前综合症的富含钙的食物：酸奶、豆腐、杏仁

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive salt to reduce bloating and water retention
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量的盐以减少腹胀和水分潴留

foodsToAvoid.en: High-sugar snacks that can cause mood swings
foodsToAvoid.zh: 可能导致情绪波动的高糖零食

foodsToAvoid.en: Caffeine and alcohol, which can worsen PMS symptoms
foodsToAvoid.zh: 咖啡因和酒精，可能加重经前综合症症状

lifestyleTips.en: Engage in calming exercises like yoga or walking.
lifestyleTips.zh: 进行瑜伽或散步等舒缓的运动。

lifestyleTips.en: Prioritize sleep to help regulate hormones.
lifestyleTips.zh: 优先保证睡眠以帮助调节荷尔蒙。

lifestyleTips.en: Drink plenty of water to combat bloating.
lifestyleTips.zh: 喝大量水以对抗腹胀。

recommendedFoods.en: Heme iron sources (easily absorbed): lean red meat, poultry, fish, liver
recommendedFoods.zh: 血红素铁来源（易吸收）：瘦红肉、禽肉、鱼肉、肝脏

recommendedFoods.en: Non-heme iron sources: lentils, spinach, tofu, beans, fortified cereals
recommendedFoods.zh: 非血红素铁来源：扁豆、菠菜、豆腐、豆类、强化谷物

recommendedFoods.en: Pair iron-rich foods with Vitamin C to boost absorption: bell peppers, oranges, strawberries, broccoli
recommendedFoods.zh: 将富含铁的食物与维生素C搭配以促进吸收：甜椒、橙子、草莓、西兰花

foodsToAvoid.en: Tea and coffee with meals, as tannins inhibit iron absorption
foodsToAvoid.zh: 餐中饮用茶和咖啡，因为单宁会抑制铁的吸收

foodsToAvoid.en: High-calcium foods (like dairy) taken at the same time as iron-rich meals
foodsToAvoid.zh: 与富含铁的膳食同时摄入高钙食物（如乳制品）

foodsToAvoid.en: Foods high in phytates like whole-grain bran, unless soaked or fermented
foodsToAvoid.zh: 富含植酸盐的食物，如全麦麸皮（除非经过浸泡或发酵）

lifestyleTips.en: Cook in cast-iron skillets to add a small amount of iron to your food.
lifestyleTips.zh: 用铸铁锅烹饪，可以为食物增加少量铁质。

lifestyleTips.en: Combine heme and non-heme iron sources in the same meal for better overall absorption.
lifestyleTips.zh: 在同一餐中结合血红素铁和非血红素铁来源，以提高整体吸收率。

recommendedFoods.en: Magnesium for cramps and mood: leafy greens, nuts, seeds, dark chocolate
recommendedFoods.zh: 缓解痉挛和改善情绪的镁：绿叶蔬菜、坚果、种子、黑巧克力

recommendedFoods.en: Vitamin B6 for mood and bloating: chickpeas, salmon, bananas, potatoes
recommendedFoods.zh: 改善情绪和腹胀的维生素B6：鹰嘴豆、三文鱼、香蕉、土豆

recommendedFoods.en: Calcium to reduce mood swings and fatigue: yogurt, tofu, fortified milk, leafy greens
recommendedFoods.zh: 减少情绪波动和疲劳的钙：酸奶、豆腐、强化奶、绿叶蔬菜

recommendedFoods.en: Omega-3 fatty acids for anti-inflammatory benefits: fatty fish (salmon, mackerel), flaxseed, walnuts
recommendedFoods.zh: 具有抗炎功效的Omega-3脂肪酸：富含脂肪的鱼类（三文鱼、鲭鱼）、亚麻籽、核桃

recommendedFoods.en: Complex carbohydrates to stabilize blood sugar: whole grains, vegetables, beans
recommendedFoods.zh: 稳定血糖的复合碳水化合物：全谷物、蔬菜、豆类

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive salt, which contributes to bloating and breast tenderness
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量的盐，会导致腹胀和乳房胀痛

foodsToAvoid.en: Refined sugar, which can lead to energy crashes and mood swings
foodsToAvoid.zh: 精制糖，可能导致能量骤降和情绪波动

foodsToAvoid.en: Caffeine and alcohol, which can increase anxiety and disrupt sleep
foodsToAvoid.zh: 咖啡因和酒精，可能增加焦虑并扰乱睡眠

lifestyleTips.en: Stay well-hydrated to help alleviate bloating.
lifestyleTips.zh: 保持充足水分以帮助缓解腹胀。

lifestyleTips.en: Engage in regular, moderate exercise to boost mood and reduce cramps.
lifestyleTips.zh: 进行规律的适度运动以提升情绪和减少痉挛。

lifestyleTips.en: Prioritize getting 7-9 hours of quality sleep per night.
lifestyleTips.zh: 优先保证每晚7-9小时的优质睡眠。

recommendedFoods.en: Qi-tonifying foods: chicken, beef, yam, sweet potato, oats, rice, dates, shiitake mushrooms
recommendedFoods.zh: 补气食物：鸡肉、牛肉、山药、红薯、燕麦、大米、红枣、香菇

recommendedFoods.en: Warm, cooked, and easily digestible foods
recommendedFoods.zh: 温热、煮熟且易消化的食物

recommendedFoods.en: Root vegetables like carrots and parsnips
recommendedFoods.zh: 胡萝卜、防风草等根茎类蔬菜

foodsToAvoid.en: Raw and cold foods (salads, smoothies, iced drinks)
foodsToAvoid.zh: 生冷食物（沙拉、冰沙、冰镇饮料）

foodsToAvoid.en: Greasy, heavy, and hard-to-digest foods
foodsToAvoid.zh: 油腻、厚重和难以消化的食物

foodsToAvoid.en: Qi-depleting foods like white radish and excessive mint
foodsToAvoid.zh: 耗气食物，如白萝卜和过量的薄荷

lifestyleTips.en: Eat regular meals in a relaxed environment and chew thoroughly.
lifestyleTips.zh: 在放松的环境中规律进餐并充分咀嚼。

lifestyleTips.en: Avoid overexertion and ensure adequate rest.
lifestyleTips.zh: 避免过度劳累并确保充足休息。

recommendedFoods.en: Warming foods and spices: lamb, shrimp, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, leeks, walnuts
recommendedFoods.zh: 温性食物和香料：羊肉、虾、姜、肉桂、丁香、韭菜、核桃

recommendedFoods.en: Cooked foods, especially soups and stews
recommendedFoods.zh: 熟食，特别是汤和炖菜

recommendedFoods.en: Warming grains like quinoa and oats
recommendedFoods.zh: 藜麦和燕麦等温性谷物

foodsToAvoid.en: Cold and raw foods and drinks (ice cream, salads, chilled water)
foodsToAvoid.zh: 生冷食物和饮料（冰淇淋、沙拉、冰水）

foodsToAvoid.en: Cooling foods such as cucumber, watermelon, bitter melon, and crab
foodsToAvoid.zh: 凉性食物，如黄瓜、西瓜、苦瓜和螃蟹

lifestyleTips.en: Keep the body, especially the lower back and feet, warm.
lifestyleTips.zh: 保持身体温暖，特别是腰背和脚部。

lifestyleTips.en: Engage in gentle exercise that warms the body, like brisk walking.
lifestyleTips.zh: 进行快走等能使身体变暖的温和运动。

recommendedFoods.en: Yin-nourishing foods: duck, pork, pear, asparagus, black beans, millet, tofu, mung beans
recommendedFoods.zh: 滋阴食物：鸭肉、猪肉、梨、芦笋、黑豆、小米、豆腐、绿豆

recommendedFoods.en: Cooling and hydrating foods: cucumber, watermelon, celery
recommendedFoods.zh: 凉润和补水的食物：黄瓜、西瓜、芹菜

recommendedFoods.en: Slightly sweet and sour fruits like apple and lemon
recommendedFoods.zh: 苹果、柠檬等微甜微酸的水果

foodsToAvoid.en: Spicy and pungent foods: chili, garlic, onion, ginger
foodsToAvoid.zh: 辛辣刺激性食物：辣椒、大蒜、洋葱、生姜

foodsToAvoid.en: Warming and drying foods: lamb, shrimp, grilled or fried foods, coffee, alcohol
foodsToAvoid.zh: 温燥食物：羊肉、虾、烧烤或油炸食品、咖啡、酒精

lifestyleTips.en: Go to bed early to nourish Yin energy.
lifestyleTips.zh: 早睡以滋养阴气。

lifestyleTips.en: Avoid excessive sweating; opt for calming exercises like yoga or tai chi.
lifestyleTips.zh: 避免过度出汗；选择瑜伽或太极等镇静的运动。

recommendedFoods.en: Dampness-resolving foods: Job's tears (coix seed), adzuki beans, radish, winter melon, celery
recommendedFoods.zh: 化湿食物：薏苡仁、赤小豆、萝卜、冬瓜、芹菜

recommendedFoods.en: Aromatic spices that transform dampness: ginger, cardamom, orange peel (chenpi)
recommendedFoods.zh: 芳香化湿的香料：生姜、豆蔻、陈皮

recommendedFoods.en: Lightly cooked vegetables and lean proteins
recommendedFoods.zh: 轻度烹饪的蔬菜和瘦蛋白

foodsToAvoid.en: Greasy, fried, and rich foods
foodsToAvoid.zh: 油腻、油炸和肥甘厚味的食物

foodsToAvoid.en: Dairy products, sugar, and sweets
foodsToAvoid.zh: 乳制品、糖和甜食

foodsToAvoid.en: Excessive raw fruits and cold foods
foodsToAvoid.zh: 过量的生水果和冷食

lifestyleTips.en: Engage in regular physical activity to move Qi and resolve dampness.
lifestyleTips.zh: 进行规律的体育活动以行气化湿。

lifestyleTips.en: Eat smaller, more frequent meals and avoid overeating.
lifestyleTips.zh: 少食多餐，避免过饱。

recommendedFoods.en: Foods that clear heat and drain dampness: bitter melon, winter melon, mung beans, Job's tears (coix seed), cucumber, celery
recommendedFoods.zh: 清热利湿的食物：苦瓜、冬瓜、绿豆、薏苡仁、黄瓜、芹菜

recommendedFoods.en: Bland and cooling foods like barley and watercress
recommendedFoods.zh: 大麦、西洋菜等清淡凉性食物

recommendedFoods.en: Green tea and chrysanthemum tea
recommendedFoods.zh: 绿茶和菊花茶

foodsToAvoid.en: Greasy, fried, and spicy foods
foodsToAvoid.zh: 油腻、油炸和辛辣的食物

foodsToAvoid.en: Sweet foods and alcohol
foodsToAvoid.zh: 甜食和酒类

foodsToAvoid.en: Warming foods like lamb, beef, and pungent spices
foodsToAvoid.zh: 羊肉、牛肉和辛辣香料等温性食物

lifestyleTips.en: Maintain a simple and clean diet.
lifestyleTips.zh: 保持简单清淡的饮食。

lifestyleTips.en: Avoid humid environments and stay cool.
lifestyleTips.zh: 避免潮湿环境并保持凉爽。

lifestyleTips.en: Ensure emotional balance, as stress can worsen heat symptoms.
lifestyleTips.zh: 确保情绪平衡，因为压力会加重热症。
